short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed for https://qutor.com/. It captures and shares content of your screen in Qutor Virtual Classroom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension is developed for https://qutor.com/. It captures and shares content of your Classroom screen in Qutor Virtual Classroom. It makes it easier for the Tutor to show the student their screen to explain anything which is unclear to the student.
